languages.text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.
languages.original_text: Цель Ментальной связи при выполнении {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} может использовать значения соответствующих характеристик псайкера, если они выше, чем собственные.

traits.locale_text: Any time until the end of combat target makes a Perception, Intelligence, Willpower, or Fellowship check, it will use Psyker's stats for it if they are higher at the moment.

At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Link makes Perception, Intelligence, Willpower, or Fellowship tests using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Link makes Perception, Intelligence, Willpower, or Fellowship tests using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

languages.text: Цель Ментальной связи при выполнении {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} может использовать значения соответствующих характеристик псайкера, если они выше, чем собственные.
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

traits.locale_text: Цель Ментальной связи при выполнении проверки Восприятия, Интеллекта, Воли или Общительности может использовать значения соответствующих характеристик псайкера, если они выше, чем собственные.
Цель Ментальной связи при выполнении проверки Восприятия, Интеллекта, Воли или Общительности может использовать значения соответствующих характеристик псайкера, если они выше, чем собственные.

languages.text: 当战斗结束前，每当心灵结合的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}时，都可以用自己与灵能者的相关属性两者较高值进行检定。
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

traits.locale_text: 当战斗结束前，每当心灵链接的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}时，都可以用自己与灵能者的相关属性两者较高值进行检定。

languages.text: En cualquier momento hasta el final del combate, el objetivo de Enlace mental realiza {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} usando sus puntuaciones o las del psíquico, las que sean más altas en ese momento.
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

traits.locale_text: En cualquier momento hasta el final del combate, el objetivo de Enlace mental realiza {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}{/g usando sus puntuaciones o las del psíquico, las que sean más altas en ese momento.

languages.text: Das Ziel von Gedankenverbindung führt zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt während des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} mit ihren Werten oder denen des Psionikers durch ... je nachdem, welche gerade höher sind.
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel von Gedankenverbindung führt zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt während des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} mit ihren Werten oder denen des Psionikers durch ... je nachdem, welche gerade höher sind.

languages.text: À tout moment et jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible de Liaison mentale passe les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} en utilisant ses propres statistiques ou celles du psyker, selon les valeurs les plus élevées à ce moment-là.
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

traits.locale_text: À tout moment et jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible de Lien Mental passe les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g en utilisant ses propres statistiques ou celles du psyker, selon les valeurs les plus élevées à ce moment-là.

languages.text: 戦闘終了までいつでも、精神連繋のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を、異能者と自身のうち、その時点で高い方の能力を使用して行える。
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了までいつでも、精神連繋のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を、異能者と自身のうち、その時点で高い方の能力を使用して行える。

languages.text: Akıl Bağı kabiliyetinin hedefi, çatışmanın sonuna dek her {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testlerinden{/g} birine girdiğinde o an kendisinin veya ruhsezerin değerlerinden hangisi yüksekse onu kullanır.
languages.original_text: At any time until the end of combat, the target of Mind Bond makes {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} using either theirs or the psyker's stats, whichever is higher at the moment.
